taxonomicnotes: The species was described by Hamilton (1822) and the name has not been mentioned in the literature except by Prashad and Mukerji (1929).
rationale: The species is currently known from two localities in Assam and West Bengal which are relatively close to each other, and may be present in Bhutan. There is indication of some threats to the species habitat (exploitation for the aquarium trade, deforestation and siltation), but at present it is assessed as Data Deficient. More information on the species distribution is required to fully assess the species, but is is likely that it will be Least Concern.
evaluator: Dey, S.C., Jha, B.R., Vishwanath, W. & Allen, D.J.
